metadata.title: CVE-2022-3572 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affectingall versions from 13.5 prior to 15.3.5, 15.4 prior to 15.4.4, and 15.5prior to 15.5.2. It was possible to exploit a vulnerability in setting theJira Connect integration which could lead to a reflected XSS that allowedattackers to perform arbitrary actions on behalf of victims.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
